黎明杀机刚出不久的时候就开始玩了，大概是16年的冬天。
到现在已经三年多了，其实19年没怎么玩了，估计也就玩了30多个小时，还是前两年玩得多。
其他游戏玩腻了，不知道该玩什么的时候，我总会打开黎明杀机，在深夜里激情偷电。
怎么说呢，我觉得这个游戏真的非常的戳我的点。啊顺便提一下因为我晕3D所以只玩人类。
从第一次进游戏，一听到心跳就乱跑，到后来主动吸引屠夫注意力，感觉黎明杀机陪伴了我许许多多的日夜。

这游戏的地图很不错的，经过几次优化，基本上除了早期几张图的轮胎墙什么的不太美观之外，其他地方都做的很美，每个地图都很用心。
地图分为几个系列，系列里再分详细地图，每张地图都有自己的特色，而且非常的，用心。
我个人超喜欢教堂那张图里不停放音乐的小丑箱，每次到了那张图就专门跑过去听歌听好久。
值得一提的是，电锯惊魂的那张图非常非常的还原电影，电影里的各种场景几乎都有，第一次进去的时候我到处看到处截图，完全顾不上理屠夫。
感觉最好的要数红树林了，雨滴落在潮湿的土地上的感觉做的特别的好。后来研究所那张图的主控区，毛玻璃上的光和空气中飘落的灰尘也特别的用心。
喜欢看风景的，或者是迈克尔、竖锯、弗莱迪粉丝的，就会很满足了。随机到自己喜欢的地图就可以开心开风景截图了，前提是你不会被吓到。

评论区很多人都觉得平衡性不好，我倒是觉得已经挺不错的。经过几次大改，曾经的无敌点、溜五台电机、拆迁大队都已经成为过去时了。目前人类是比屠夫要弱一些的。
相比于人类和屠夫之间的平衡，我觉得屠夫和屠夫之间的平衡还是差一些的，屠夫因为固定了特殊技能，所以很难调整。人类的话，传承技能点了之后就没区别了，只是模型区别了。
这个游戏虽然疯狂出新dlc，但实际上，强力的技能都是初始本体自带的那几个。
新屠夫和新人类的技能都属于花哨不实用的类型，但模型好看啊！而且故事和小电影也非常吸引人！后来还出了商城，可以愉快氪金买皮肤了！算下来一套衣服才30多，比某游戏里动辄199的皮肤良心多了。
我觉得最好的一点就是，即使你不买任何dlc，也可以享受新地图和碰到新人类/新屠夫。

最近新开的资料库什么的活动我不是很喜欢，太花哨，又麻烦，食之无味，弃之可惜。
另外，自从资料库上线以来，服务器越来越不稳定了。想当初，排队半小时，游戏十分钟是真的。后来优化过几次，已经好很多了，有一段时间服务器稳定的令我想哭。最近不但各种连不上，还会出现闪退，非常难受。服务器不稳定是本游戏非常大的一个缺点，从刚开始就是这样的，到现在也。。。希望能改进啊！

真想再上一次人皇啊！
Несмотря на баги и акцент на казуальных игроков, игра достойная. Онаимеет уникальный геймплей, не имеющий достойных аналогов. Мне заходит кароч.

Why I came back to dead by day light. I played it for a year when it first came out. Eventually I got bored. Main reason was it was stressful dying to killers bad ping (going over pallets and windows). I constantly saw it doing well on twitch which got me curios. I do wish that this game restyled their look to a more animated style. Having the game look realistic is pointless because after a few hours the game isn't even scary any more. I think the cosmetic idea is very smart and the rift pass it just sucks I don't like the look of the game. However most addicting game ever! love it!

Steam keeps asking me to revise my review. Here's my revision. The devs don't care about balancing the game. They keep releasing new content, but don't fix bugs that have been in the game for LITERAL YEARS. If you want a responsive development team, don't play this game.

Original review continues as follows.
The game itself is good. It has fun and engaging gameplay, a nice progression system, and a lot of the characters can be unlocked via in game earnable currency. The game is great if you play without actually caring about winning. Still, I would not recommend getting into the game.

The problem is with playing the killer side of the game. There's so much more pressure placed on playing killer than playing survivor, and that combines with the fact that most of the survivors are going to insult you if you actually manage to pull the win off. While you won't run into toxic players very often, when you do run into them, they're horrific, and abuse all the broken stuff to make your life miserable. 

Lets take this a step further and discuss the matchmaking system in this game, as compared to other games with ranked play. In most ranked play, higher ranked players are only allowed to play with high ranked players. Low ranked players are locked into low ranks, to keep things balanced. Dead By Daylight takes that system, uses it as toilet paper, then after flushing it and it gets stuck in the pipes, plunges it back out and slaps it on the game, calling it done. A low ranked killer can be matched with a full high ranked team as long as there is one low ranked survivor in the group, via the mechanic they call Survive With Friends. So a low ranked killer who just started playing can get a group of three players with over two thousands hours each and one player who's been playing for a week. Guess how that goes.

All of this ends up as a result of a very simple fact. High rank killer is not fun for most players, because it is constant stress, and even the slightest slip up results in a loss.

To be fair, this is an excellent marketing decision for the developers, as the vast majority of the player base is survivors who play with their friends. Of course they're going to market to those players. Does it make for a balanced and fun game? Not in the slightest.
This doesn't matter so much at higher rank, as it allows the high rank killers to have a weak link in the group to target to bring them down. But as a lower rank, it means you're going to end up playing against people who are MUCH more skilled than you on a regular basis, and it makes you feel like absolute shit.

I have the product for free because I was a beta player, and I got the full copy on release. I recently picked it up again to play with friends, and while it has gotten a lot more balanced, there's still a long way for things to go. To put it lightly.

Update: The game's gotten worse. It now bugs out at least once a play session, sometimes even crashing my entire computer. All programs I run to diagnose the problem trace it back to DbD. And the game has gotten even more unbalanced in favor of the survivors, with the developers nerfing powerful killer tools and offerings, but not changing broken things for the survivors. This game is slowly losing its playerbase, and I couldn't be happier.
